mapper.select: select participate_project_file_id, teacher_id, first_participate_project, key_difficulties, end_participate_work from software.participate_project_file where participate_project_file_id = #{participateProjectFileId}
select participate_project_file_id, teacher_id, first_participate_project, key_difficulties, end_participate_work from software.participate_project_file limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into software.participate_project_file(teacher_id, first_participate_project, key_difficulties, end_participate_work, participate_project_file_id) values (#{teacherId}, #{firstParticipateProject}, #{keyDifficulties}, #{endParticipateWork}, #{participateProjectFileId})

insert into software.participate_project_file(teacher_id, first_participate_project, key_difficulties, end_participate_work) values
(#{entity.teacherId}, #{entity.firstParticipateProject}, #{entity.keyDifficulties}, #{entity.endParticipateWork})

insert into software.participate_project_file(teacher_id, first_participate_project, key_difficulties, end_participate_work) values
(#{entity.teacherId}, #{entity.firstParticipateProject}, #{entity.keyDifficulties}, #{entity.endParticipateWork})
on duplicate key update teacher_id = values(teacher_id) , first_participate_project = values(first_participate_project) , key_difficulties = values(key_difficulties) , end_participate_work = values(end_participate_work)
mapper.update:
update software.participate_project_file
teacher_id = #{teacherId},
first_participate_project = #{firstParticipateProject},
key_difficulties = #{keyDifficulties},
end_participate_work = #{endParticipateWork},
where participate_project_file_id = #{participateProjectFileId}
